entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
